summary: There are .nif meshes for all the standard weapons that have had their scabbards removed, to be used for static items.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]

I needed to make some static weapons for a display, with no scabbards showing. I could not find any so i went in with Nifskope and removed the scabbard and blood layers, leaving only the mesh for the weapons, and collision data. I'm not the best nifskope, but have gotten all these meshes to work in game.

I am only including the new meshes, they should load the standard textures, and you will have to make your own static object. Just look in Data>meshes>Morgaloth>Weapons folder.

Please use these as you like, give me credit if you want.

Please leave a comment if you have any problems.

author: Morgaloth
